reviews.text: It‚Äôs good, but not authentic. Too much oil, salt, and sugar.
Best food in NYC! Me and my friend enjoyed our food and drinks here. Highly recommend checking this spot out!!

Ask about spice levels‚ÄîThai cuisine often brings heat, and Karachi diners may prefer moderate spice, so specify your preference.

For best experience, go earlier rather than peak time; quieter means better service and maybe less waiting.

If you‚Äôre sharing dishes (which is great for Thai), try a curry + a stir-fry + maybe a classic noodle dish so you get variety.

Confirm parking or access in DHA/Clifton-area, as nearby traffic/parking can add hassle

I love Thai food near me! My favorite neighborhood Thai spot I come here so often and food is always fresh and flavorful! Aot & Fah are soooo awesome, friendly, and kind. My friend from out of town was visiting and I had to bring her here bc it‚Äôs the best spot :)
Aof and Fah made our experience amazing! Great service and fun environment.
Green curry - Aof and Fay - great service

‚óèBEST THAI FOOD‚óè
*Server: Nook A, Ohm
We ate parang curry and pad Thai!
I love curry here so much. Pad Thai was so nice. Highly recommend!!
Store was very clean even toilet.

It was amazing! Definitely one of the best Thai meals I‚Äôve had in New York! We ordered the Pad Thai, Panang Curry, and spring rolls, all highly recommended!! The staff were incredibly kind and attentive, especially Nook A and Ohm who took great care of us. üòä
Mixed sea food soup was excellent
So yummy! Nice and clean Thai place. Happy I stumbled upon it.

Stumbling upon this place was fortunate! The servers perform at the same level as the chefs. Workers acted promptly, competently, and in a friendly way. Relaxed spot for dining. This place enhances our dining landscape.

Ohm and nook were great waiters, good service. Food prices were very high for the specialty dishes like the Khao soi for over $40. Also they incentivize $5 discounts for giving a review on google maps, which is probably part of why they have such high ratings. Be warned. Aesthetics and food taste is still good though, just menu prices for specialty dishes are significantly higher than anything I've seen in the dozens of thai places I've been in Manhattan. So my family ordered the simpler dishes only

Last night, I ordered their chicken pat see ew over the phone for my coworker to pick up for me. I spoke to a woman who assured me my food will be ready in 10 minutes and it‚Äôll cost $22 and change. When my coworker arrived, a man said the order was never placed and that was a lie. My coworker said he saw a woman in the kitchen cooking and the perception was she was the woman who took my order but acted as if she never got it when the fact was she didn‚Äôt want to admit that she forgot to submit my order. This was very disappointing, unprofessional and negligent on their behalf especially since competition is high in Manhattan and I can go to one of the other Thai restaurants within a 3 block radius. Their food is delicious but what they did to me and my coworker was lousy.
The Tom Yum soup here is amazing ‚Äî full of flavor, spicy, and perfectly balanced! The service was friendly, and the atmosphere was cozy. Highly recommend this place if you love authentic Thai food!

Really great food and staff is extremely friendly! Especially Mai!

Mai helped and is helping me marry the love of my life!!

Food was bomb, devoured everything service was great, very attentive and very nice seating area as wel, Ohm greeted us very kindly and Snook was very good in bringing us the food. Thank you all for the very good meal.
I loved the experience and the food! Ohm and Snook were very lovely hosts. Thank you all for the good meal and service :)
Food was amazing!!!! Going to come again when we‚Äôre back in NY. Ohm and Snook provided for us perfectly. Love them ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
The food here was so good! Everything was fresh and full of flavor. The staff were nice, especially Snook and Ohm! and the service was fast. Hope to come back soon!
Food was bomb! I loved Ohm and Snook. They took care of us, and the food came out quick and hot.
Fah and Mind were our servers and they were awesome. It was a great restaurant and they served us really quickly. Great food, highly recommend
The food was amazing and the atmosphere was great. Fah and Mind were extremely nice and we had a great time!
Mine was amazing! Food is incredible, service is just as good. Highly recommend this local neighborhood spot.
Our server  mind and fah was exceptional m. The food was one of the best Thai food in NYC. Highly recommended this restaurant.
I live in the neighborhood  the first time with this restaurants we never had an I am impressed tastiness of the dishes. And the complexity of the spices. I it was definitely come again. Harvey
Excellent food and service! Friendly staff: Fah, Mind and Ohm were the best. The Panang Curry was fantastic. Highly recommend.
Mind and fah ohm were so nice!
Wonderful food and service (shoutout to Mind!)
Thai food near me is delicious,  I wish I had one near me and the hostess/waitress Mie was the sweetest and so attentive. Will definitely be coming back... ü•∞ loved their Thai tea!

Great food,
Great service by Nook and Ohm.
Thanks üôè
The food was amazing, we got the chicken Panang and chili chicken wings!

We always order take out from here but decided to dine in and so happy we did! We sat in the back patio which is covered and had live music. Very nice ambiance.

Food was very delicious as always. A little spicy but the right amount even for those who like mild.

Mind ohm fah was our wonderful server. Very attentive and gave good recommendations.

Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Thai food near me is such a cute little spot in the city with delicious food. Service and presentation was amazing! Special thanks to Nook A and Ohm for taking care of us so well! We will definitely come back here! Thank you.

Thai Near Me is an absolute gem! The food and ambiance are phenomenal, every bite transported me straight to Northern Thailand. Mie is a phenomenal server and host; she made us feel truly welcomed and her recommendations were spot on. Don‚Äôt miss the Khao Soi...it‚Äôs unforgettable.

Adt and Fah are the best waiters
Very Helpful, and the food is so good Good. Very recomendable
Really delicious food, recommend the shrimp pork dumplings and the Massaman curry ! Great service too from Fah and Aof!!
2 pieces of shrimp as the protein add on charge of 8 bucks. Not normally this bad but this was surprising
What an amazing experience!! Don‚Äôt just walk past it the next time you are in the area. This joint serves up some amazing food coupled with excellent service and ambience. Absolutely loved it!!
My food was perfect. I preferred the Crispy Duck Tamarind w/jasmine rice. The service was A1, my servers Fah and Mind were great and provided excellent service.
Thanks mind and fah for a great service!
Mind and fah they are very nice person, really like the food here.
Fah, Mind and Nook served us really well. The food was great too. Highly recommend
Food was delicious, great service from Fah, Mind and Nook
Great food and nice service (shout out to Nook)
Really beautiful space and expansive menu!
The food and service was great. The staff members, Mind fah nook, were FANTASTIC! Make sure you get patio seating!
Mind and fah nook are the absolute best!!! Amazing food and experience. An NYC must try üòä
This place was amazing! We walked in on a Friday night and were seated quickly. The food was quick and delicious.
Nice place, good food

The best Thai food in NYC!! This place is super close to my new apartment and me and my mother enjoyed their delicious Thai food! The lychee iced tea was delicious as well! 10/10, I highly recommend this place! You‚Äôll love the food, drinks, and much more! The music was also outstanding, great vibes and great staff.

I absolutely love this place! I come here often, and every visit is just as amazing. The atmosphere is warm and welcoming, and the food is beyond delicious  bold, authentic flavors that truly remind me of being in Thailand.

If you‚Äôre looking for real Thai food with rich, spicy, and authentic taste, this is the spot. The prices are very reasonable, everything is fresh, and the drinks are perfectly balanced.

The staff are wonderful kind, attentive, and always ready with great recommendations. My server made sure our experience was excellent. I‚Äôll definitely keep coming back because I love Thai food, and this restaurant is easily one of the best in NYC.

Highly recommended for both date nights and family dinners. And if you come on the weekend, you‚Äôll also enjoy their live music such a great vibe!

Found this cute little spot in NYC and it was amazing. The atmosphere was the absolute cutest and such a vibe.  The food was delicious and the presentation was spot on!  Ohm had the drinks covered  and Nwok gave us top notch service. It did not disappoint!!

The food was delicious and the portions were very generous ‚Äî everything tasted fresh and flavorful, especially the seafood and curry dishes.

The service was excellent as well, very friendly and attentive, which made the whole meal even more enjoyable. Definitely a place I‚Äôd recommend and would love to come back to!

The food was amazing, the atmosphere was lovely, and the music just tied it all together. I genuinely enjoyed every part of it. And honestly, for the quality, the pricing felt totally appropriate it wasn‚Äôt expensive at all for what you get. Mind was such a wonderful server attentive, kind, and made the whole experience even better. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back. So, so delicious.

One of the best Thai food places in NYC! A must try! Fah, Ohm, and Mind were amazing and very attentive! My group thought the food was very and tasted very authentic! Our favorites were the mango sticky rice and salmon green curry! The live entertainment was also so good we felt right at home.

The food is really good! I got the crispy chicken and it came with Jasmine rice. The portion sizes were big, even for the appetizer (I got the vegetable roll)! Our server Ohm was very helpful and attentive.

Best thai in town! We ordered two pad thai and a massaman curry, and they were delicious. I also loved the way food is served on the plate. A pleasure for both the eyes and‚Ä¶ the belly!! Mindi served us and was so kind and welcoming. If I ever return to NYC, I will definitely come back!

Don‚Äôt let the clever name fool you, this is a legit eatery! The food and service was wonderful. If we lived here I would go weekly to be able to try everything
We had the spring rolls and Massaman Curry with chicken.

Fah,Ohm,Nook were our servers for the night & they were so sweet! Food here is awesome and authentic- definitely coming back. Shoutout to the red curry!! 7-10pm has live music, such a vibe for hangouts with friends.

An excellent restaurant I wholeheartedly recommend. The place seats around fifteen people, which makes for a wonderfully peaceful and intimate dining experience. I started with the tofu appetizer and followed with the green curry ‚Äî probably one of the best curries I‚Äôve had so far. The flavors are perfectly balanced, rich and authentic. This restaurant offers a true culinary escape, all in a calm and relaxed atmosphere.
My husband and I absolutely loved the authentic Thai food at Thai Food Near Me. The ambience of the restaurant was lovely for our little lunch date! ‚ù§Ô∏è

A hidden gem in Murray Hill! This Thai spot is an intimate, cozy, and nice restaurant for your classic Thai dishes and fun ones that you typically don't see! Service was very nice here.

We got the scallop appetizer, pineapple "sober" noodles with shrimp, and crispy pork belly pad thai. Everything was phenomenal. The scallop appetizer was absolutely amazing and came with great garnishes and sauces. Both noodles dishes were also so flavorful, and the noodle texture was perfect. Would definitely come back here to try their other menu items!
The pineapple sober noodle is so good and the papaya salad is also very fresh and tasty. I love the plate aesthetics too!
We came an hour early, yet Fah was very nice accommodating us. Service was amazing! The servers were wonderful! Food is definitely delicious! Best Thai restaurant we‚Äôve ever been to.

After one visit I am confident ‚ÄúThai Food Near Me‚Äù will become my regular Go-To Thai Restaurant in New York City

The Food, restaurant vibe, and staff are all top notch. My Chicken Red Curry was the best I have ever had - and I‚Äôve had a lot.

Our Waitress, Mind, in addition to being super fast, was lovely and gave my mother and I a tour of the unsuspecting but magnificent back patio dining area at end.

Ohm behind the bar was also very personable.

I one hundred percent recommend for a fine dine in experience. Very few places can be quality takeout or the ideal place to go on a date with all the ambience of fancy cocktail bar.

‚ÄúThai Food Near Me‚Äù is the place to be.

TLDR: The price is worth it, food is plated wonderfully, is delicious, the small restaurants aesthetic is wonderful, and the customer service experience is amazing (Ohm was a great help).

I‚Äôll be the first to say that this restaurant is on the pricier end. Nothing too undoable, but notably pricier than other Thai restaurants in the immediate area. However, its price is wholly reflective of the quality of service, food served, and the presentation of the food. Ohm, the server who took my order, was super friendly, and had great recommendations. He was also very understanding when I messed up my order the first time, and helped me resolve it with no qualms. So not only was the food great, but the customer service was excellent.

I ordered their lunch special online to go, which included Basil Fried Rice, Fries, Spring Rolls, and a drink, along with their Mango Sticky Rice and a Thai Tea to eat there. The flavor of the Basil Fried Rice was great, the heat wasn‚Äôt overpowering the other flavors (a pet peeve of mine), the texture of the rice was great, and it was a good, classic dish overall. My friend (who the Lunch Special was actually for, I just stole some), who is notoriously picky, enjoyed it tons.

The real show stopper for me was their Mango Sticky Rice (which was actually ordered for me). The dessert is coming back in season, and they‚Äôre advertising it rightfully so. The homemade Coconut Ice cream is comes with is downright delicious. I wish I could emphasize that more. It was creamy, decadent, and indulgent. Note that this is coming from someone who was actually initially skeptical since I‚Äôm not a big fan of Coconut Ice Cream (Ohm assured me it was delicious, and checked in with me afterwards. He was obviously right). The rest of the dish was wonderfully balanced. The Coconut Cream wasn‚Äôt too sweet, the salt was well balanced, the rice was warm and just the right texture, and on top of all of this, it was plated beautifully. Not deserving of its own paragraph, but still delicious was the Thai Tea‚Äî not too sweet which is exactly how I like it.

I will be raving about this restaurant for a long while and recommending it to all my friends.
cute place to go on a date or grab dinner with friends. Service was fast and food was great! Especially loved the spring rolls.
Great atmosphere! Definitely sit in the back area if you can. Our server Nook was very attentive and nice.

The soup (Tom Yum w/shrimps) was delicious and was a very large portion. The panang curry was also a large portion, with excellent sauce. The restaurant is cozy and comfortable, and the staff are quite friendly. Not cheap, but quite a lot of food, and really gourmet Thai!
Food and service are superb‚Ä¶ Plates were presentably wonderful along with the very sumptuous meal served‚Ä¶ will definitely be back to try some of their cuisine üòã
Mind and fah were so sweet and this restaurant serve amazing delicious meal. Highly recommend‚Ä¶ you should make an reservation becuase instantly full all tables.

First time here! HOW & WHY? Idk maybe it‚Äôs because I live in Brooklyn but OMG! Food is soooo good. Delicious, appealing, and so fresh! Plus our waitress (mind) was FANTASTIC and our bartender (ohm) was AMAZING as well. First time here but definitely won‚Äôt be the last. If you‚Äôre looking for amazing authentic Thai food you have to go! What are you waiting for??? Gooooooooooooo ü§£

Snook was amazing and so hospitable!
The mango sticky rice was sooooo good , food presentation was beautiful for each dish too!

Such a friendly staff and authentically nice. Not to mention the live music!! Amazing musicians, singer and pianist were great!! They all together create a very nice enviroment.

I got Pad See Ew with Beef and it truly was tasty, highly recomended.
Thank you Aof , Fah and Ohm for the good and friendly service.
Food  was really good here specially Panang curry . And  Mind was super nice to recommend food for us being new to the place . Definitely visiting the place againüíü‚Ä¶

The best elevated Thai food so far traveling across the US. Absolutely delicious! The presentation and service is impecable. The whole experience is superb. We had 2 dishes from chefs specialties list: seafood drunken noodles and duck red curry. The duck was juicy and crispy at the same time, the total killer! Best duck in a long time. The prices are for chefs specialty menu ranges $35-$45 but it‚Äôs absolutely worth it. Plates are very large (curry dish is for sure to share). 1000% recommend!

It was one of the best Thai meals I‚Äôve had in the city. Fah, Ohm, Nook, and Mind made the whole experience even better. They were super friendly and really attentive without being over the top. The salmon green curry was a standout, and we ended the night with mango sticky rice that was spot on. The live music gave the place such a good vibe; honestly, it felt like being back home. It's definitely a spot I‚Äôd come back to and recommend to friends.

We were visiting NYC, celebrating our 33rd wedding anniversary!!!

If you‚Äôre seeking an exceptional Thai dining experience in NYC, Thai Food Near Me is an absolute gem! Despite its very small space, this restaurant packs a punch with some of the BEST THAI FOOD we‚Äôve ever had‚ÄîEVER!

From the moment we stepped inside, we were greeted by the warm and welcoming staff who made us feel right at home. Their friendly demeanor and attentiveness added to the charm of this cozy spot, making the atmosphere inviting and enjoyable.

Now, let‚Äôs talk about the food. Our dinner was nothing short of spectacular.  We ordered the basil fried rice, which was bursting with flavor and perfectly cooked. The fragrant basil and fresh ingredients made it an absolute delight!

We also ordered in the Frenched Lamb Chop Nam Jim Jaew, and it was a showstopper. The lamb was tender and juicy, beautifully seasoned. Each bite was packed with flavor, making it one of the highlights of our meal.

Finally, the star of our dinner was the Crispy Duck Tamarind with jasmine rice. The duck was perfectly crispy on the outside, succulent on the inside, and the tamarind sauce added a unique and delicious twist. It was a dish that truly showcased the culinary prowess of the kitchen.

Overall, our experience at Thai Food Near Me was phenomenal!!! While the space may be small, the quality of the food and the warmth of the staff more than make up for it. If you‚Äôre in the Murray Hill area, do yourself a favor and stop by‚Äîyou won‚Äôt regret it!
Aof Fah and the whole staff were very friendly and accommodating the food was delicious the atmosphere was very nice and the live music on a Sunday night at 7 was a delightful unexpected bonus.

This restaurant is a gem! The food is absolutely delicious, the atmosphere is warm and inviting, and the service is top-notch. Special shout-out to Ohm, the bartender‚Äîhis drinks were AMAZING and made the whole experience even better. From start to finish, everything was perfect. Definitely a place I‚Äôll be coming back to and recommending to friends!
Panang curry had the perfect level of creamy/spicy. Good portion for the price. Will come back again.
Small place but very well managed. A lot of thought went into running this establishment.

Had an amazing experience at this wonderful Thai restaurant. The food was excellent! We had king prawns with seafood sauce, a delicious fish dish, and several cocktails. I felt like I was in Thailand again. They really took the time to explain everything with humor. Patty was delightfulüåπ

Having a Thai meal at this restaurant is an exquisite experience! You pay more but it's really worth it. The food is flavorful and the presentation is outstanding. They brought me a little pitcher with water so I can pour some into a little golden leaf with a magic towel to wash my hands. The quality of the food, the service, the modern, chic decor and attention to details are all AMAZING! I went there expecting another simple Thai noodle lunch but they hit it out of the park!

I've been here twice. The food is sublime! Truly, as good Thai as I've ever had. The Crispy Duck Tamarind is perfect in every way. Tonight I had a Crispy Fish (rainbow trout) special. It was a massive portion, super fresh and truly, as promised, crispy, with a spicy mango and cashew salad. Heavenly! My companions had massaman curry, pad Thai, and pork belly, all spectacular.

The most impressive aspect of the meal was that we needed to switch tables to accommodate one member of our party, and they did it with grace and smiles, though it was doubtless a colossal PITA for them. I thank them and want to promote this lovely restaurant for their thoughtfulness and terrific food and service.

Wowww!! I've been super psyched about this Thai restaurant for a while, and I finally got to check it. It is, I'm sure, the purest source of authentic Thai river prawns-almost like dining in Thailand. Crispy pork, papaya salad, and pad Thai are some extra mouthwatering options. üòã The owner and all staff members are extremely welcoming, ü´∂üèª and the service is fantastic. The food is completed on time. I absolutely adore it and consider it one of the best Thai restaurant in Manhattan!

you‚Äôre looking for truly authentic Thai food, this restaurant is a hidden gem. Every dish is full of rich, traditional flavors that immediately take you to Thailand.

The service is equally impressive. The staff is warm, attentive, and genuinely welcoming, making you feel right at home from the moment you walk in. They‚Äôre happy to explain the menu and offer great recommendations based on your preferences.

Overall, this is the kind of place you‚Äôll want to come back to again and again. Highly recommended for anyone craving real Thai food in a lovely setting.
I have pork belly curry was so good and also crispy duck tamarind was delicious..We definetely will be back
